body_html: @tzuf The official site shows the info. Try to limit OMP_NUM_THREADS=8, and see how much time it costs. BTW, is your machine a cluster of CPU? And could you provide info(model and dataset) of the case that you run very slow?
body_text: @tzuf The official site shows the info.  Try to limit OMP_NUM_THREADS=8, and see how much time it costs. BTW,  is your machine a cluster of CPU?  And could you provide info(model and dataset) of the case that you run very slow?
body: @tzuf The [official site](https://ark.intel.com/products/46499/Intel-Xeon-Processor-X7560-24M-Cache-2_26-GHz-6_40-GTs-Intel-QPI) shows the info.  Try to limit OMP_NUM_THREADS=8, and see how much time it costs. BTW,  is your machine a cluster of CPU?  And could you provide info(model and dataset) of the case that you run very slow?
